p: The statistical analysis was performed using Prism software (Prism 5.0, San Diego, CA, USA). The data were analyzed by Student’s t-test, Student–Newman–Keuls’s multiple-comparison test, or two-way ANOVA using SAS v 8.2 (SAS Inst. Inc., Cary, NC, USA). The Student–Newman–Keuls’s multiple-comparison test was used for comparisons among the groups, and the LPS and NOX2 protein siRNA were used as factors in the two-way ANOVA. The values are presented as means ± standard error of the mean (SEM), and those at p < 0.05 were considered significant.
